Find out where to invest in commercial real estate in the next 6 months and preview top-tier brand, cash-flowing investment opportunities. We welcome both current investors and those new to Caliber to join us, Wednesday, October 25th, at 6:00 pm for a chance to meet like-minded people and learn from the experts.
Caliber Summit Series: Own Your Share - Four Points By Sheraton
16074 N. 78th St Ste B-104, Scottsdale, AZ 85260

An integrated group of companies in the real estate and private equity industry, Caliber was formed in 2009 as a response to the need for a transparent investment partner. Headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona with an investment focus in the Greater Southwest growth markets, Caliber employs more than 600 talented individuals.  With a core team of approximately 50 parent company members, Caliber seeks to maintain a close-nit culture as it expands and grows.  Caliber is comprised of multiple operating businesses which create 5 core departments: Investment, Construction & Development, Property Management, Brokerage, and Hospitality.Caliber accomplishes its mission by planning and executing asset-based investment strategies, including owning and managing single and multi-family residential properties, acquiring land, office, hospitality and specialty spaces.  Currently, the company holds a diversified portfolio in excess of $250,000,000 in assets under management.

Purpose-built by and for passionate sports fishermen and business executive teams who value first-class fishing experiences paired with personalized services and amenities, all-inclusive Salmon Falls Fishing Resort reinvents the Ketchikan fishing getaway. Guests enjoy exceptional cuisine and handcrafted cocktails, superior fishing excursions (guided and self), freshly updated guest rooms and suites, and what some believe is the ultimate feature -- on-site fish processing to clean, freeze and pack a your catch.

November 23, 2016, DAVID was a client of Chris’

I'm so impressed with Chris, Caliber Co, and his entire team.  Having developed a relationship with him during the past 3 years I have found him to be very sincere, focused on our conversation, transparent, and very professional. He is also a strong supporter of Eliances and our community of entrepreneurs, he is a builder (both literally and with our entrepreneurs)  in our community.  I also had the privilege of having him on the Eliances Heroes show which received many positive reviews from our listeners.  My only regret is that I don't have more time to spend with him given my busy schedule.

summary: "Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing." - Warren Buffett"The four most dangerous words in investing are: 'this time it's different.'" - Sir John Templeton"In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable." - Robert ArnottAs a co-founder and CEO of Caliber, my limits are tested every day as I stretch to be the leader my team, shareholders, and clients deserve.  The opportunity we have created in the market continues to grow and I look forward to each day of new challenges.  Caliber is ultimately a vehicle to build wealth for all of our stakeholders and we take our job very seriously.  My personal career began with retail banking, grew with big 4 accounting, and has found its purpose in entrepreneurship.  At each stage in my career I have sought out new possibilities to apply my talents.  I believe in the power of strong relationships, honor in dealings, integrity, 100% responsibility, transparency, and discipline.Currently I am the CEO of Caliber, a full service real estate investment firm.Caliber specializes in the following aspects of real estate:1.)	Private equity / Private placements2.)	Private lending3.)	Joint ventures4.)	Fix & Flips5.)	Asset Re-positioning6.)	Asset Management7.)	Note Acquisitions8.)    Property Management9.)    Remodeling & Construction10.)  FinancingCaliber specializes in the following types of assets:1.)    Hospitality2.)    Multi-Family Apartments (Large & Specialty)3.)    Single Family Residences4.)    Office / Commercial
